#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
int main()
{
  int t;
  scanf("%d",&t);
  
  while(t)
  {
    long long int k,n;
    scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
    //k=n;
    int *count=(int *)calloc(10,sizeof(int));
    while(n>0)
    {
       count[n%10]++;
       n=n/10;
    }
   // k=2*n;
    while(k>0)
    {
      if(count[k%10]>0)
       count[k%10]--;
      else
       count[k%10]++;
      k=k/10;  
    }
    int i=0;bool test=true;
    for(i=0;i<10;i++)
    {
     if(count[i]!=0)
       {test=false;break;}
    }
     if(test)
     printf("1\n");
     else
     printf("0\n");
   t--;
  }
}
